body_html:
Quick-and-dirty solution. Convert all Markdown files to PDF, then join. Order maybe broken, but you get a single PDF (2856 pages, some documents missing, without images).

$ cd tensorflow/g3doc
$ for i in $(find . -name "*md"); do pandoc -s -o $i.zzzz.pdf $i; done
$ pdfjoin -o tfdocs.pdf $(find . -name "*zzzz.pdf" -printf "%p ")
body_text:

body:
Quick-and-dirty solution. Convert all Markdown files to PDF, then join. Order maybe broken, but you get a single PDF (2856 pages, some documents missing, without images).

```
$ cd tensorflow/g3doc
$ for i in $(find . -name "*md"); do pandoc -s -o $i.zzzz.pdf $i; done
$ pdfjoin -o tfdocs.pdf $(find . -name "*zzzz.pdf" -printf "%p ")
```
